romance.metaDescription: Destination weddings, honeymoons and romantic getaways organized by SR Global Experiences.
romance.bannerSubtitle: We create magical moments to celebrate love in all its stages.
romance.exploreDesc: Every special moment deserves a unique experience. Discover our personalized proposals for every stage of your life.
romance.honeymoonDesc: Start your story together with a trip as special as your love. We create tailor-made romantic experiences that you will remember for a lifetime.
romance.bachelorDesc: Celebrate your last adventure as a single with unforgettable experiences. Fun, adventure and special moments with your friends before the big day.
romance.anniversaryDesc: Renew your vows and celebrate your love with experiences designed to commemorate each year together in a special way.
romance.rivieraMayaDesc: White sand beaches and turquoise waters, the perfect setting for a romantic getaway with your partner. Enjoy candlelit dinners and exclusive experiences.
romance.parisEuropeDesc: Immerse yourself in the history and romance of European cities. From Paris, the city of love, to the canals of Venice or the castles of Scotland.
romance.honeymoonModalDesc: Every honeymoon deserves to be as unique as your love story. Our romantic travel design experts will help you create unforgettable moments:
romance.honeymoonPoint1: Romantic destinations specially selected for couples
romance.honeymoonPoint2: Exclusive accommodations with special details for newlyweds
romance.honeymoonPoint3: Private experiences: candlelit dinners, couples massages, sunset walks
romance.honeymoonPoint4: Professional photography to capture your most special moments
romance.bachelorModalDesc: The last adventure before 'I do' should be as special as it is fun. We organize memorable bachelor/bachelorette parties:
romance.bachelorPoint1: Activities adapted to your tastes: adventure, relaxation, parties or a mix of everything
romance.bachelorPoint2: Options for all budgets and group sizes
romance.bachelorPoint3: Experiences in Riviera Maya: private catamaran, exclusive cenotes, themed parties
romance.bachelorPoint4: Complete organization of accommodation, transportation and activities
romance.anniversaryModalDesc: Celebrate each year of love with a memorable experience. We help you commemorate your anniversary in a special way:
romance.anniversaryPoint1: Romantic getaways to meaningful destinations for your relationship
romance.anniversaryPoint4: Personalized surprises to make the day even more special
